instruction.value: Administer dose by direct injection into free flowing infusion.

AdditionalNotes.value: Bladder Cancer. Dilute dose in 50 mL sterile water for injection.
Squamous Cell Carcinoma of Anus. Maximum dose: 20 mg.

Doses greater than 20 mg/m2 do not demonstrate increased effectiveness and are more toxic than lower doses. Total cumulative doses of 50 to 60 mg/m2 are associated with increased risk of adverse effects (pulmonary toxicity and renal toxicity).
